and execution of all IT functions Maintain all management information systems upgrades hardware and updates software as required Provide user support and manage IT staff and service providers IT Manager Santa Fe Springs CA June 2010 to May 2016 Worked with leadership to develop vision and roadmap for information technology to promote company advancement and growth Assessed and analyzed processes to improve ERP system Met IT financial objectives by forecasting requirements preparing annual budget scheduling expenditures analyzing variances and initiating corrective action to ensure financial health of company Conducted research on potential technology solutions and implementations in support of new initiatives opportunities and strategy efforts Managed IT staffing including recruitment supervision scheduling training and development evaluation and disciplinary actions Developed implemented and adhered to all IT policies and procedures including those for architecture and infrastructure security disaster recovery standards equipment purchasing and service provision Authorized and oversaw deployment monitoring maintenance development and support of all hardware and software including enduser devices and applications Acted as escalation point for resolving network related issuescomplaints for users when necessary including contacting all parties directly Oversaw negotiation and administration of vendor outsource provider and consultant contracts and service agreements Implemented information technology strategies policies and procedures by evaluating organization outcomes identifying problems evaluating trends and anticipating requirements Maintained quality service by establishing and enforcing technology standards aligned with company core values Implemented disaster recovery and backup procedures and information security and control structures Network Administrator Santa Fe Springs CA January 2006 to May 2010 Responsible for keeping network functioning at optimal levels including LAN WAN and connection with external networks Identified root causes of error conditions and efficiently resolved system problems server maintenance and backup software maintenance and patch level administration managed application change control and deployed internal and external applications to QC and production systems Assigned and maintained user
